gongSync.note: No new calls for Jonathan since Feb 3. Last call was Jan 30.

signals.signal: BREAKING: Neo Financial raised $68.5M TODAY (Feb 4) at higher valuation than 2024. 100+ Canadian investors in oversubscribed round. Total funding now $650M+. Using proceeds for securitization program to fuel growth.
signals.recommendation: IMMEDIATE RE-ENGAGE. Prior 'soft layoffs' concern is INVALIDATED - company just closed major round. Budget exists. Push hard for pilot commitment.

signals.signal: CONFIRMED: EvenUp raised $150M in 2025, valued at $1B. Launched Communication Agents + Next-Gen AI Drafts Suite (Jan 30). Published AI adoption change management guide. Company in aggressive expansion mode.
signals.recommendation: RE-ENGAGE GARRETT EDEL NOW. 105+ days stalled on $50K is unacceptable - they're spending aggressively on tools.

signals.signal: Won Microsoft Local Partner Award FY25 (AI Transformation - Scale Category, Dec 2025). 6,000+ US companies assessed in 2025 alone (61% returning customers). $1B valuation (2022). Stable growth.
signals.recommendation: Proceed with pilot. Strong company fundamentals, recognized AI leader in sustainability space.

signals.signal: Won Bronze Stevie Award (Feb 3) for 'Best Use of AI in Customer Service'. Company actively investing in AI capabilities, publishing AI browser comparisons.
signals.recommendation: Positive signal - company healthy and innovating in AI.

signals.signal: Muse headband mentioned at CES 2026 alongside competitors (Neurable, Naox, Elemind). Brain-sensing/neurofeedback market heating up with new entrants. Muse Athena is latest product.
signals.recommendation: Industry competitive pressure increasing. If in discussions, understand their competitive positioning.

signals.signal: MAJOR: ProductBoard launched 'Spark' AI Product Management Agent (Jan 28). Positioning as 'complete product management command center' with MCP connectors, agentic execution. Direct competitor to Reforge product strategy positioning.
signals.recommendation: COMPETITIVE THREAT. ProductBoard moving aggressively into AI-powered PM tooling. Impacts positioning in PM-focused deals. Need differentiation story.

signals.signal: No new funding rounds found. Still positioned in customer feedback analytics. Competitor PostHog raised Sept 2025. Enterpret appears stable but not expanding aggressively.
signals.recommendation: Enterpret not an immediate threat. Focus on ProductBoard and emerging AI agents in PM space.

signals.signal: No significant news. Last funding was 2021 (AU$5M at AU$150M valuation). Company appears stagnant - no recent growth signals.
signals.recommendation: Dovetail not a competitive threat. May be vulnerable to displacement.

signals.signal: Reddit/social: Users report replacing Canny+ProductBoard with cheaper alternatives like Featurebase (saving $300-500/mo). Tool consolidation trend. Legal tech funding hit $6B in 2025 with 79% AI-driven.
signals.recommendation: Price sensitivity growing. Reforge needs ROI-focused positioning vs point tool alternatives.
